column4: mat-dg:  That is what I thought.  :D  I would double check all of the firewall stuff.  Maybe a SP3 upgrade did something stupid to the machine as well.
Freaking-Busy:  There are tons of how-tos on the net.  You need two NIC's.
Freaking-Busy:  The easiest way is irCop
thanks.. i was looking for a starting point.
